entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon then light snow. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 25.
